text: Itola is a village in Vadodara district in the Indian state of Gujarat. ==Demographics== India census, Itola had a population of 3,600. Males constitute 51.83% of the population and females 48.17%. Itola has an average literacy rate of 80.59%: male literacy is 88.13%, and female literacy is 72.53%. In Itola, 10.83% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==Transport== ===Railway=== Itola railway station is located on the Western Railway Mumbai – Vadodara Segment. It is 52 km from Bharuch, 18 km from Vadodara. ==References== Category:Villages in Vadodara district
title: Itola
